short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for measuring distance and acreage on a map

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension opens a searchable map that has a polygon drawing tool and a line drawing tool. With these tools the user can measure acreages and distances.
